JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description            3-7 years of experience in web development for enterprise software.           Expert in building back end services with Web API (REST), C# and Entity Framework.           Expert in building modern web application using TypeScript, CSS3, HTML5 with experience in JavaScript libraries such as Angular.           Experience in writing testable code and using testing frameworks such as MS Test, xUnit, Jasmine.           Experience in building mobile applications in OutSystems/HTML5/React Native/Ionic etc.           Experience working in an agile environment.           Tertiary qualification in Computer Science or related field.           Effective communication skills; ability to express ideas logically.           A passion to continuously learn about modern technologies and improve skills.            Qualifications            Experience in developing large-scale database managed software systems.           Experience in build and deployment processes using modern CI/CD tools eg. AzureDevops, OctopusDeploy.           Understanding of cloud technologies and their use in a hybrid environment.           Understanding of design patterns and their use, and when to apply them.           Understanding of functional programming principles.           Understanding of design thinking principles.
